name: Shinobi Reviews
author: Shinobi Works

sections.description:
Shinobi Reviews can gather and manage many kinds of reviews. For example, if you want to add customer reviews in your site, all you need to do first is just create a form and display it in your site. After that, you need to do is just wait to be posted reviews.

Demo

If you want to try this plugin before activation, you can use it on English version or Japanese version

Anti-Spam

Don’t worry if you are concerned about posting spam reviews. You can use Google reCAPTCHA and it blocks spam reviews.

Membership System

There is a membership system in this plugin. You can use it to anti-spam not only reviewer management.

Administrator can manage

The posted review can be managed by the administrator. Unnecessary reviews can be deleted or modified.
sections.faq:
How do I use it?

  1. Create a review form in admin
  2. Copy the shortcode displayed after saving
  3. Paste the copied shortcode into the article
  4. Users can post reviews on your website

Which browser works?

This plugin works with modern browsers and Internet Explorer 11.
sections.changelog:
1.6.0

  • feat: Added a feature to change the initial review approval status

1.5.9

  • test: Tested on WordPress 6.3
  • test: Tested on PHP 7.4 to 8.2
  • chore: Updated dependencies

1.5.8

  • Introduced the system that a reviewer can edit their own review
  • Changed the required version of PHP to 7.4
  • Fixed a minor bug about the review form
  • Tested on WordPress 6.0
  • Refactoring

1.5.7

  • CSS improvements

1.5.6

  • Fixed a bug that review date is not displayed correctly
  • Changed to a behavior that a reviewer is not allowed to post a review in a row at once
  • Removed the filter that replaces the uniqid of a logged-out user with a session ID

1.5.5

  • Added the new form type “Movie”

1.5.4

  • Improved to work membership system correctly when the multiple shortcodes have is_membership parameter
  • Fixed some bugs

1.5.3

  • Fixed a bug that session does not work correctly
  • It is now able to render multiple shortcodes
  • CSS improvements

  • CSS improvements
